trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.AddIn.Contract" /> namespace contains interfaces and structures that provide the basis for communication between components that are updated independently.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.AddIn.Contract" /> contém interfaces e estruturas que fornecem a base para a comunicação entre os componentes que são atualizados de modo independente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace defines a set of interfaces and structures that can be used by independently updated components, such as an application and an add-in, to communicate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.AddIn.Contract?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace define um conjunto de interfaces e estruturas que podem ser usadas por independentemente atualizadas componentes, como um aplicativo e um suplemento para se comunicar.

trans-unit.source: Components can use the interfaces and structures in the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace to communicate across process or application domain boundaries, or to communicate with other components in the same process or application domain.
trans-unit.target: Componentes podem usar as interfaces e estruturas no <xref:System.AddIn.Contract?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace para se comunicar em processo ou limites de domínio de aplicativo, ou para se comunicar com outros componentes no mesmo processo ou domínio de aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The interfaces in the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace are also called contracts.
trans-unit.target: Interfaces de <xref:System.AddIn.Contract?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace também são chamados de contratos.

trans-unit.source: All contracts derive from the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract> interface.
trans-unit.target: Todos os contratos derivam o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract> interface.

trans-unit.source: The purpose that <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract> serves for components created using the .NET Framework is similar to the purpose that the `IUnknown` interface serves for components created using COM.
trans-unit.target: A finalidade que <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract> serve para componentes criados usando o .NET Framework é semelhante à finalidade que o `IUnknown` serve de interface para os componentes criados usando COM.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether an object implements a particular contract, components use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract.QueryContract%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar se um objeto que implementa um contrato específico, os componentes usam o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract.QueryContract%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespaces contain additional contracts that supplement the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespaces contêm contratos adicionais que complementam o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace contains contracts that components use to access type information and invoke type members.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace contém os contratos que componentes usam para acessar informações de tipo e chamar membros de tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace contains contracts that define collections of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract> and <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace contém os contratos que definem coleções de <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract> e <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument> objetos.
